title: Correction to: Clinical and radiographic predictors of failed hip arthroscopy in the management of dysplasia: a systematic review and proposal for classification.
abstract: Unfortunately, the author name was incorrectly published in the original publication as Sochi Uchida insted of Soshi Uchida. The author name is corrected here by this Erratum. The original article has been corrected.
